title: Energy
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Pollution - Environmental aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Power resources
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Energy conservation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Energy consumption
description: Explores energy in humans, animals, the elements and the earth. Shows how these kinds of energy are harnessed and how they are used daily in home and industry. Shows that pollution is a result of excessive use and barren devastation is a result of a lack of conservation. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
